wikitext.*:
On [[13 June]] [[1955]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Deirdre Levinson''', a student.<ref name=Chron/>

*'''Publication:''' A description of the letter was included in ''Bonhams Books, Maps and Manuscripts 23 March 2004''.<ref name=Books/>
*'''Subject:''' Arranging a meeting.<ref name=Chron>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], "[http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology]" (accessed 26 November 2011)</ref><ref name=Books>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72490 Books, Maps and Manuscripts. 2004] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 26 November 2011)</ref>
